Text.Page: A particularly brutal argon named {@LinkCreature:48#25} led the attack on our facility. Watching it fight chilled my blood.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Sounds like a target worth killing."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Agreed. Take {@LinkCreature:48#25} out and report to {@LinkCreature:248#1001}.

{@LinkCreature:48#25}'s dead? Outstanding work.

That monstrosity inflicted tremendous casualties on our forces. Its death will boost morale. Thanks.
